summary: The implementation successfully adds motivational messages functionality with backend storage, home page display with refresh capability, and post-breathing-cycle messages. However, the messages are in English instead of Portuguese as required, and there are only 10 messages instead of the required 15-20.

missing_requirements.requirement: Messages must be in Portuguese to match user's language preference
missing_requirements.reason: All 10 motivational messages in backend/main.mo are in English (e.g., 'Take a deep breath. You're doing better than you think.'), but the constraint explicitly requires Portuguese messages

missing_requirements.requirement: At least 15-20 unique motivational messages are available
missing_requirements.reason: The backend implementation provides only 10 motivational messages in the motivationalMessages array, falling short of the minimum 15 messages required
